layers.info:
קבוצה - team

פופולרי - popular

לבחור - pick

להזמין - order

מיליון - million

לאהוב - love

להשאיר - leave

אי - island

להכות - hit

שמח - glad

יקר - Dear

פוחד - afraid
כל/שום דבר - anything
מילים להכתבה באנגלית
להשאיר
I must leave the keys on the table.
אי
I dreamed of a vacation on a tropical island.
להכות
The big wave is about to hit the shore.
שמח
I'm glad to hear you succeeded in the test.
פוחד
The child is afraid of the dark at night.
קבוצה
Our team won the game yesterday.
לבחור
It's hard for me to pick between these two books.
מיליון
There are more than a million stars in the sky.
(ה) יקר
Dear Tommy, I hope you're feeling well.
כל/שום דבר
I'm so hungry I could eat anything.
פופולרי
This new movie is very popular among teenagers.
להזמין
I want to order pizza for dinner.
לאהוב
I'm learning to love the taste of black coffee.
